nodes.body: {!header} ğŸŠ This is the very first, inaugural St Louis Game Developer Roundup! Yay! Follow the links on the page to submit news, links, or announcements for the next one!

{ğŸ® releases} [Bring It On!](https://bringiton.axolstudio.com/) by [Axol Studio, LLC](https://axolstudio.com/) just had a [major new sticky update ](https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2020460/view/3877098283553322712?l=english) to the game!

{ğŸ“° articles} Polygon's [Top 50 Games of 2023](https://www.polygon.com/23648669/best-video-games-2023) list. Do you agree?

{ğŸ’°classifieds} Pixel Artist Wanted - Hello St. Louis community! I have been working on a casual puzzle golf game for mobile tentatively called 90Â° Golf and I need a pixel artist to replace the placeholder art I've been using and help solidfy the aesthetic for the game. There's not a lot of art in the game, but I'd like it to be high quality and charmingly animated. If you'd like to learn more please send some samples and your rates to super_wes on Discord, [@SuperWes on X](https://twitter.com/SuperWes), or [@superwes.bsky.social on Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/superwes.bsky.social).
{ğŸ“… events} The [Video Game History Foundation](https://gamehistory.org/) [Winter Fundraiser 2023](https://gamehistory.org/donate/) is going on now! Consider supporting the cause!
